name: Het Kansara
achievements_and_projects_info:
Hii!...

Me, Het Kansara welcomes you to quick introduction of my work and achievements.
Here are just few of them.
Hope you like it.
about_paragraphs: Het Kansara is a Web & Mobile Application developer with 1 year of industrial experience. He worked with multiple clients to cater to their IT needs through developing web & mobile applications. Also, He was awarded the certificate for providing a noteworthy contribution to the success of his employer's organization for the year 2018. Currently, He is enrolled in the Web Development - Graduate Certificate at Humber College and very excited to begin his industrial experience in Canada.
place_to_talk_text:
Thank you for your interest in my portfolio.
Feel free to talk with me for any other information.
Have a great day!

experience.description: Worked on one of the biggest project of the company - WaterExpert by Ovivo (https://www.waterexpert.com) as lead frontend developer in Ionic/Angular. Implemented most complex modules of the project by myself.
Worked on one of the IOT project of the BizTech as lead frontend developer in Ionic/Angular. Implemented most complex modules of the project by myself.

achievements: 1st Rank in Coding in C Programming(<CODE-A-THON>) held at LJ Institute of Computer Application, Organized by Japanese MNC - ACTY System.
2nd Rank in Web-Designing (Tech Kaushalya-2016) held at Gujarat University.
1st Rank in Web-Designing (Talaash-2014) held at Silver Oak Collage of Engineering & Technology.
1st Rank in Web-Designing (Avishkar-2015) held at NSIT (Narnarayan Shastri Institute of Technology).
2nd Rank in Web-Designing (ICT Make in India-2015) held at Ahmedabad University.
2nd Rank in Web-Designing (Tech Tune-2015) held at LJ Institute of Computer Applications.
3rd Rank in Web-Designing (Talaash-2015) held at Silver-Oak Collage of Engineering & Technology.
